wikipedia_page.main: Sir Armigel de Vins Wade CMG OBE (17 October 1880 – 4 December 1966) was a British colonial official.

response: * Sir Armigel Wade (1890–1966), Colonial Secretary in Kenya (1934–1939)

response: *Armigel Wade (1880–1966), Acting Governor of Kenya in 1935 and from 1936 to 1937
